Stock Market Module¶

class stock_market.StockMarket[source]¶

Bases: object

calculate_dividend_yield(stock_symbol: str, price: float) → float[source]¶

Calculate the dividend yield for a given stock and price.

Parameters:

  • stock_symbol – Symbol of the stock (e.g., ‘TEA’).

  • price – The market price of the stock.

Returns:

The dividend yield as a float.

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the stock symbol is not found or the price is non-positive.

  • TypeError – If the price is not a number.

calculate_gbce_all_share_index() → float[source]¶

Calculate the GBCE All Share Index using the geometric mean of traded prices for all stocks in the last 15 minutes.

Returns:

The GBCE All Share Index as a float.

Raises:

ValueError – If there are no trades in the last 15 minutes.

calculate_pe_ratio(stock_symbol: str, price: float) → float[source]¶

Calculate the Price/Earnings (P/E) ratio for a given stock and price.

Parameters:

  • stock_symbol – Symbol of the stock (e.g., ‘ALE’).

  • price – The market price of the stock.

Returns:

The P/E ratio as a float.

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the stock symbol is not found, the price is non-positive, or the last dividend is zero.

  • TypeError – If the price is not a number.

calculate_volume_weighted_stock_price(stock_symbol: str) → float[source]¶

Calculate the Volume Weighted Stock Price (VWSP) based on trades in the past 15 minutes for a given stock.

Parameters:

stock_symbol – Symbol of the stock (e.g., ‘JOE’).

Returns:

The VWSP as a float.

Raises:

ValueError – If the stock symbol is not found or there are no trades in the last 15 minutes.

record_trade(stock_symbol: str, share_quantity: int, buy_sell_indicator: int, traded_price: float)[source]¶

Record a trade with details such as stock symbol, quantity of shares, buy/sell indicator, and traded price.

Parameters:

  • stock_symbol – Symbol of the stock (e.g., ‘GIN’).

  • share_quantity – The number of shares traded.

  • buy_sell_indicator – Indicator of the trade type (0 for ‘buy’, 1 for ‘sell’).

  • traded_price – The price at which the stock was traded.

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the stock symbol is not found, share quantity is non-positive, buy/sell indicator is not 0 or 1, or traded price is non-positive.

  • TypeError – If the share quantity or traded price is not a number.
